chapters.name: Research and Prepare
chapters.description: Research on which industry and company to invest in.

chapters.name: Invest
chapters.description: Make the investment in some legal-binding process.

chapters.name: Government Reaction
chapters.description: The government will regulate or subsidy the investment.

chapters.name: Withdraw Investment
chapters.description: If the investment is unsuccessful, the investor will withdraw.

chapters.name: Followup Investment
chapters.description: If the investment is successful, the investor will continue to invest.
